article_text:
Carrollton, GA (30117)

Today

A mix of clouds and sun during the morning will give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. High 86F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph..

Tonight

Partly cloudy skies. Low 63F. Winds light and variable.

article_metadata.author: Tony Montcalm/For the Times-Georgian

og.description: Theresa Stapler has an “Up” philosophy on life.
og.title: Stapler is still looking ‘up’

article_metadata.description: Theresa Stapler has an “Up” philosophy on life.
